content.question: The inclusion of radiating semicircular niches (exedrae) in the plan of San Vitale allowed its architect to

choices.label: use natural light to illuminate the wall mosaics in the sanctuary
enlarge the size of the central dome by reducing its overall weight
create a clear distinction between the areas reserved for clergy and those reserved for lay people
integrate the central domed space with the surrounding ambulatory and gallery

content.answer: integrate the central domed space with the surrounding ambulatory and gallery
